article.headline: N. Arizona 92, Montana St. 84, OT
article.story: BOZEMAN, Mont. (AP) -- Tyrone Bazy scored 11 of his 21 points in the final 2:11 of overtime as Northern Arizona pulled away to a 92-84 victory over Montana State Sunday afternoon. Carson Durr hit a 3-pointer with 2:29 left in regulation to pull Montana State (11-17, 8-7 Big Sky) to 72-68 and another 3 with 27 seconds left to give the Bobcats a 74-72 lead. Kyle Landry made a basket with 16 seconds left to send the game into overtime tied at 74. Landry made the first basket of overtime and then made two free throws with 3:20 remaining to give Northern Arizona (16-11, 10-5) an 81-78 lead. He finished with 16 points and 13 rebounds. Bazy started his scoring streak with a jumper with 2:11 remaining and his three-point play with 46 seconds left gave NAU an 87-83 lead. The Lumberjacks made all 12 of their free throws in overtime, including seven by Bazy, while Montana State made just 4 of 8. Stephen Sir added 18 points for NAU before fouling out with 2:36 left in overtime. Mecklen Davis led the Bobcats with 21 points, followed by Nick Dissly with 16 and Ted Morris with 15 points and 10 rebounds. Ruben Boykin Jr. finished with 17 points and 10 rebounds. He scored 11 points in the first half as NAU led 39-33. The Lumberjacks led by as much as 55-47 with 11:26 left in regulation before MSU went on an 8-0 run to tie the score at 55. The teams battled back and forth the rest of the way.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
